definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article

sentences.english: I'm looking for a jacket. I'd like one with a bag.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找一件夹克，我想要件带兜的。

sentences.english: It is excellent to carve as it hardly splinters at all.
sentences.chinese: 对于雕刻件它是极好的，因为它几乎不碎裂。

sentences.english: I probably did the wrong thing.
sentences.chinese: 那时，我可能做了件错事。

sentences.english: That makes it tough for Sisson to cheat, which she says is a "good thing."
sentences.chinese: 这使得西森难有机会作弊，但她认为这是件好事情。

sentences.english: He is wearing an olive green coat.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着件橄榄绿的外套。

sentences.english: This is a great good deed. The people involved can all benefit from it.
sentences.chinese: 这是件大好事，只要是参与的人都可以从中获益。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 挂号信件，按照国务院邮政主管部门规定的金额赔偿。

sentences.english: He cumbered himself with an overcoat on a warm day.
sentences.chinese: 大热天穿着件大衣简直使他活受罪。

sentences.english: I provoked him into doing something really stupid.
sentences.chinese: 我用激将法使他做了件很蠢的事。

sentences.english: To sum up all, uprisings have been disastrous.
sentences.chinese: 总之，暴动是件祸国殃民的事。

sentences.english: That they buy T-shirts for and spout off about endlessly?
sentences.chinese: 无非就是买了件t恤什么的至于说个没完嘛。

sentences.english: The cost of media is an important but troublesome consideration.
sentences.chinese: 宣传媒体的开支是件非常重要而又很麻烦的事。

sentences.english: He made a coat of Ligong Wool, which looked nice.
sentences.chinese: 他做了件礼服呢的大衣，看上去还不错。

sentences.english: Xiao Wang likes the silver pink sports-wear very much.
sentences.chinese: 小王非常喜欢那件银红色的运动服。

sentences.english: This coat looks very good on you.
sentences.chinese: 那件外套你穿着很好看。

definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]
